DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to evaluate the level of satisfaction among patients to whom Mirvaso® / Onreltea TM (trade mark) is prescribed.
DOC.brief_title: Mirvaso® Utilisation and Patient Satisfaction Evaluation (MUSE)
DOC.criteria: Patients to whom the physician has already decided to prescribe Mirvaso® /OnrelteaTM according to package insert
